titleStmt.title: The weavers joyful counsel and invitation to the French vvar. As it was posted upon the Royal Exchange, Monday Feb. the 5th. from Weavers Hall, with their additional answer to the French-mens flouts.
titleStmt.author: I. S.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Welcome brave news, the best that ever came ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
